title: OAT - Offline Album Tidy
description: A privacy-first, browser-based face recognition tool that uses face-api.js and MobileFaceNet (ONNX) to sift through thousands of photos locally using Web Workers and OPFS.

title: VibeScript (Chitrapath)
description: An AI-powered storytelling experience that transforms PDFs into cinematic scenes with generated visuals, narration, and background music using LangGraph and Llama 3.2.

title: MediMate
description: A smart medication companion unit featuring a circular 28-compartment automated dispenser, AI scheduling, and real-time adherence tracking via MediProgress.

title: Airosphere
description: A MERN stack community platform for college branches with Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) and academic resource management serving 1.6k+ visitors.

title: Gyan-Path
description: An indoor navigation app for campus buildings using Dijkstra's algorithm and multilevel bidirectional graphs to optimize multi-floor routing.

title: BareMetal (PolyScope)
description: An interactive runtime visualizer to help developers understand low-level mechanics like memory management, concurrency models, and compilation.

title: StackSmith CLI
description: A command-line tool to scaffold fullstack boilerplates for MERN, Redux, and Tailwind setups, with over 900+ downloads on npm.

title: LogKyaKahenge
description: An AI-powered roasting platform that analyzes digital footprints and delivers personalized humor in Indian personas.

title: What-If
description: A creative platform that transforms hypothetical scenarios into visually stunning Ghibli-style animated stories using Gemini 2.0.

title: BidGrid
description: An intelligent RFP management platform that automates vendor distribution, response collection, and AI-powered recommendations.

title: DOM-O-RAMA
description: A visual VDOM simulator to learn how modern frontend frameworks like React, Vue, and Svelte update the DOM through interactive diffing.

title: PlanIt
description: An automated timetable generator utilizing hybrid genetic algorithms and SOM to reduce scheduling conflicts by 40%.

title: Neuro Bots Site
description: The official web platform for the Neuro Bots Robotics Club, acknowledged by the GGITS college administration.
